name: anarchic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not showing respect for official or accepted rules, behaviour, organizations, leaders, etc.: Milligan's anarchic humour has always had the power to offend as well as entertain.
without organization or control, especially describing a society with no government or a very weak government
